text:
Hi, all. I'm the Content Marketing Manager for Perspectium, an IT Service Management (ITSM) and SaaS company based in San Diego. I work remotely from Greenville, South Carolina - and I've seen a couple other of my Greenville connections in here! Wouldn't be surprised if I also see here some people I've met at CMWorld and Inbound.

Anyway, over the last several weeks, I've posted just a little in here (and have been lurking even more). Now, I'm looking for new full-time work in content marketing for an ITSM company that I can do remotely from Greenville. If you hear of anything, I'd appreciate a DM.

Aside from that interest, I'd also love to connect with other content marketers on LinkedIn. You can find me here:
<https://www.linkedin.com/in/alfredodeambrosi/>

Thanks for reading this and for interaction here that I've already had with many of you. Looking forward to a lot more.
